column3: Uncategorized;The senate of the Kingdom of Cambodia has officially announced on the afternoon of September 29
column5: the first vice-president of the Senate
column6: passed away at 1pm on September 29 at the age of 74
column7: The procession and cremation will take place on October 3.------http://www.rasmeinews.com/%E1%9E%9B%E1%9F%84%E1%9E%80-%E1%9E%93%E1%9F%83-%E1%9E%94%E1%9F%89%E1%9F%81%E2%80%8B%E1%9E%8E%E1%9E%B6-%E1%9E%A2%E1%9E%93%E1%9E%BB%E1%9E%94%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9A%E1%9E%92%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%93%E2%80%8B/
